2143.subject: VIET
2143.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the third semester of Vietnamese. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language Proficiency Requirement through assessment must enroll in VIET 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in VIET 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language Proficiency Requirement through assessment, must enroll in VIET 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in VIET 201 or 202.
